title: Operation Atlas Character Dossier
description: A structured profile for a key asset or entity within the Atlas narrative.

aliases.description: A list of known aliases or cover identities.

designation.description: Their narrative role (e.g., The Operator, The Engineer, The Hunter).

location.description: Current or last known geographical location.

attributes.description: Core personality traits on a 1-10 scale.

skills.description: Specific, noteworthy abilities or areas of expertise.

quirks.description: Unique, unusual, or para-natural abilities and traits.

vulnerabilities.description: Key weaknesses, threats, or exploitable traits.

network.description: Connections to other characters in the story.

key_quote.description: A single quote that defines their core personality or worldview.

narrative_arc.description: A brief summary of their current story and primary objective.
